mods.note: Shows portion of Central America, northwestern South America, southern United States, and coast of Tamaulipas in Mexico. Relief shown pictorially. Appears in the author's Theatrum orbis terrarum. Includes illustrations. Text on verso.
mods.accessCondition: Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright is retained in accordance with U. S. copyright laws.
